__e: You turn your back on everything and now you're picked to fight the good fight.
And you were chosen to show me the way.
At the very end, he started yelling... and asked me if I didn't think Almighty God... had chosen him to lead the German people to their destiny.
The truth is that she's chosen me, and I don't know why yet, that for the first time in my life...
That God wants sacrifice but not suffering, that you can still serve him with the woman you love... ..that God has chosen for you... by your side.
